definition: to weave/to plait/to organize/to group/to arrange/to edit/to compile/to write/to compose/to fabricate
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc
five-stroke code, Chinese character input method
Punycode (encoding for internationalized domain names) (abbr. for 國際化域名編碼|国际化域名编码[Guo2 ji4 hua4 Yu4 ming2 Bian1 ma3])

pinyin: Man4 che4 si1 te4 bian1 ma3

sentences.english: Avoid hard-coding blank spaces or tabs at the end of a line of sample code.
sentences.chinese: 要避免在示例代碼行的結尾用硬編碼空格或製表符。

sentences.english: NorthStar, the first name in heavy-duty encoders, has the solution.
sentences.chinese: 北極星，在重型編碼器的名字，有解決方案。

sentences.english: The encoding rules are very flexible and support the representation of data graphs and polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 編碼規則非常靈活並支持圖形數據和多態的表示。

sentences.english: An optical method of pseudocolor equidensity encoding of photographic image is described. Frequency modulating of input image is made through!
sentences.chinese: 本文用光學方法實現了圖象等密度假彩色編碼。

sentences.english: Generics can help you resolve coding problems earlier in the development cycle.
sentences.chinese: 泛型可以幫助您在開發週期的早期解決編碼問題。

sentences.english: Lastly, we designed coding plan of internal code of full information for mongolian information processing system.
sentences.chinese: 最後設計出了蒙古文信息處理全息內部碼的編碼方案。

sentences.english: The coded signal is received by satellite dish aerials.
sentences.chinese: 編碼信號由碟形衛星天線接收。

sentences.english: It is related to chunked Transfer-Encoding responses from the server.
sentences.chinese: 它是分塊傳輸編碼的響應從服務器。

sentences.english: Channel coding is a fundamental method to improve the communication reliability.
sentences.chinese: 信道編碼是提高通信的可靠性的必要手段。

sentences.english: We are currently recoding all the computers in our office.
sentences.chinese: 們現在正爲辦公室的所有計算機重新編碼。

sentences.english: We’re removing all hardcoded paths from the framework.
sentences.chinese: 我們從框架中移除了所有的硬編碼的路徑。

sentences.english: This invention describes a hydroxylamine benzene dismutase, its coding gene and applications.
sentences.chinese: 本發明公開了一種羥氨苯歧位酶及其編碼基因與應用。

sentences.english: Some typical pseudocolor encoding results are presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了典型的假彩色編碼結果。

sentences.english: On the modern World Wide Web, most pages are no longer hand-coded.
sentences.chinese: 在現代萬維網中，大多數頁面都不再用手動編碼。

sentences.english: You can easily extend the custom plug-in to handle organization-specific coding standards. Here are some typical guidelines
sentences.chinese: 很容易通過擴展定製的插件處理組織特有的編碼標準。

sentences.english: The major characteristic parameters of different RLL codes were compared.
sentences.chinese: 對不同遊程受限編碼的主要性能參數進行了比較。

definition: to stick/to affix/to adhere/to paste (as in "copy and paste")/Taiwan pr. [nian2 tie1]/also written 黏貼|黏贴[nian2 tie1]
to duplicate/to make a copy of/to copy/to reproduce/to clone
entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
variant of 標誌|标志[biao1 zhi4]
